Name: LU 857 - Zoning, 252 Victory Boulevard, Staten Island (C 210361 ZMR)
Title: Resolution approving the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 210361 ZMR, a Zoning Map amendment (L.U. No. 857).

History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by Roll Call.

\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
\b By Council Members Salamanca and Moya\b0\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\tx720\tab WHEREAS, Victory Boulevard Realty, LLC, \expndtw-6 filed an application \expndtw0 pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 21c, changing from an R3-2 District to an R6B District, changing from an R3X District to an R6B District, establishing within an existing R3-2 District a C1-3 District, and establishing within the proposed R6B District a C1-3 District, which in conjunction with the related action would\expndtw1  \expndtw0 facilitate the construction of a five-story, 63,629-square-foot mixed-use building with 46 dwelling units, 12 of which would be permanently affordable, along with community facility and commercial uses located at 252 Victory Boulevard in the Tompkinsville neighborhood of Staten Island Community District 1 3 (ULURP No. C 210361 ZMR) (the "Application");\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\li120\ri155\qj\tx720\tx7560\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on September 10, 2021 its decision dated September 1, 2021 (the "Decision") on the Application;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tqr\tx9360\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Application is related to application N \cf1 210362 \cf0 ZRR (L.U. No. 858), a zoning text amendment to designate a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing (MIH) area with Options 1 and 2;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tx2880\tx3600\tx4320\tx5040\tx5760\tx6480\tx7200\tx7560\tx7920\tx8640\tx8933\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on September 24, 2021;\par
\par
WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the Revised Negative Declaration issued August 30\super th\nosupersub , 2021, which supersedes the Negative Declaration issued May 3\super rd\nosupersub , 2021 (CEQR No. 21DCP153R) and Revised Environmental Assessment Statement issued August 27\super th\nosupersub , 2021 concluded that the revised analysis would not result in any new or different significant adverse environmental impacts not already identified in the previous Negative Declaration which include an (E) designation to avoid the potential for significant adverse impacts related to air quality and noise (E-615) (the \ldblquote Revised Negative Declaration\rdblquote ).\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928 RESOLVED:   \par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tx720 The Council finds that the action described herein will have no significant impact on the environment as set forth in the (E) Designation (E-615) and Revised Negative Declaration.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj Pursuant to Sections 197-d and 200 of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in the report, C 210361 ZMR, incorporated by reference herein, and the record before the Council, the Council approves the Decision of the City Planning Commission.\par
\pard\ltrpar\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\ri140\qj\tx720\tx7560 The Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, effective as of December 15, 1961, and as subsequently amended, is further amended by changing the Zoning Map, Section No. 21c: \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx7560\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-630\li720\qj\tx720 1. \tab changing from an R3-2 District to an R6B District property bounded by the northwesterly centerline prolongation of Avon Place, the northeasterly prolongation of the northwesterly streetline of Rosewood Place, the northwesterly prolongation of a line 100 feet southwesterly of Avon Place, a line midway between Victory Boulevard and Rosewood Place and its northeasterly prolongation, the northwesterly centerline prolongation of Bayview Place, and Victory Boulevard;  \par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-630\li720\qj  \par
2. \tab changing from an R3X District to an R6B District property bounded by the northwesterly prolongation of a line 100 feet southwesterly of Avon Place, the northeasterly prolongation of the northwesterly streetline of Rosewood Place, the northwesterly centerline prolongation of Bayview Place, and a line midway between Victory Boulevard and Rosewood Place and its northeasterly prolongation;  \par
 \par
3. \tab establishing within an existing R3-2 District a C1-3 District bounded by the northwesterly centerline prolongation of Bayview Place, a line midway between Victory Boulevard and Rosewood Place, a line 400 feet northeasterly of Cebra Avenue, and Victory Boulevard; and \par
 \par
4. \tab establishing within the proposed R6B District a C1-3 District bounded by northwesterly centerline prolongation of Avon Place, a line 75 feet southeasterly of Victory Boulevard, the northwesterly centerline prolongation of Bayview Place, and Victory Boulevard;  \par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj as shown on a diagram (for illustrative purposes only) dated May 3, 2021, and subject to the conditions of CEQR Declaration E-615 Borough of Staten Island, Community District 1.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx7560\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\par
Adopted.\par
\par
\tab Office of the City Clerk, \}\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj The City of New York,  \} ss.:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\qj I hereby certify that the foregoing is a true copy of a Resolution passed by The Council of The City of New York on October 21, 2021, on file in this office.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\par
\par

\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qr .....................................................\par
City Clerk, Clerk of The Council \par
